QuestData.Title: The Farseer
QuestData.Description: The Thunderlord warleader... $n, you have to stop him.$B$BHe went to attack Drek'Thar at the Pool of Visions to the northwest!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Kill him before he kills Farseer Drek'Thar!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get to the Pool of Visions and kill Warleader Gargrak.
QuestData.RewardText: Wolf Home is saved, but I sense a stronger enemy just over the horizon.
